title: Time Calculations - Extended Practice
description: Comprehensive practice with time calculations covering various real-world scenarios

questions.question: Anna starts her workout at 6:15 a.m. She exercises for 45 minutes and then cools down for 10 minutes. What time does she finish?
Ben begins studying at 2:30 p.m. He studies for 1 hour and 25 minutes, then takes a 15-minute break. What time does his break end?
Carol starts cooking at 5:45 p.m. Preparation takes 30 minutes and cooking takes 1 hour and 10 minutes. What time is dinner ready?
Dave starts his commute at 7:20 a.m. The train ride takes 35 minutes and walking takes 12 minutes. What time does he arrive at work?
Eva begins her piano lesson at 3:40 p.m. The lesson lasts 50 minutes and she practices alone for 20 minutes afterward. What time does she finish?
Frank starts painting at 10:15 a.m. He paints for 2 hours and 30 minutes, then cleans up for 25 minutes. What time does he finish cleaning?
Grace starts her meeting at 11:50 a.m. The meeting runs for 1 hour and 35 minutes. What time does the meeting end?
Henry begins his lunch break at 12:25 p.m. He eats for 30 minutes and takes a 15-minute walk. What time does he return to work?
Iris starts her dance class at 4:35 p.m. The class is 1 hour and 15 minutes long, followed by a 10-minute cool-down. What time does she finish?
Jack starts his grocery shopping at 9:40 a.m. Shopping takes 55 minutes and checkout takes 8 minutes. What time does he finish?
Kate begins her book club at 7:15 p.m. The discussion lasts 1 hour and 40 minutes, then they socialize for 25 minutes. What time do they finish?
Leo starts his haircut appointment at 2:50 p.m. The haircut takes 35 minutes and styling takes 15 minutes. What time is he done?
Mia starts her yoga session at 6:25 a.m. The session lasts 1 hour and 5 minutes, followed by 15 minutes of meditation. What time does she finish?
Noah begins his car wash at 1:15 p.m. Washing takes 25 minutes and waxing takes 40 minutes. What time does he finish?
Olivia starts her tutoring session at 4:10 p.m. The session lasts 1 hour and 20 minutes, then she reviews notes for 10 minutes. What time does she finish?
Peter starts his garden work at 8:30 a.m. He works for 2 hours and 15 minutes, then waters plants for 20 minutes. What time does he finish?
Quinn starts her pottery class at 3:45 p.m. The class runs for 1 hour and 30 minutes, then cleanup takes 15 minutes. What time is she done?
Ryan begins his bike ride at 7:05 a.m. He rides for 45 minutes, rests for 10 minutes, then rides for another 30 minutes. What time does he finish?
Sophie starts her swimming lesson at 5:20 p.m. The lesson lasts 50 minutes and she showers for 15 minutes afterward. What time is she ready to leave?
Tom starts his photography session at 10:40 a.m. Setup takes 20 minutes, shooting takes 1 hour and 45 minutes, and packing takes 15 minutes. What time does he finish?
Uma begins her violin practice at 4:55 p.m. She practices scales for 20 minutes and pieces for 40 minutes. What time does she finish?
Victor starts his woodworking project at 9:25 a.m. Cutting takes 45 minutes, assembly takes 1 hour and 10 minutes, and finishing takes 25 minutes. What time is he done?
Wendy starts her baking session at 1:35 p.m. Mixing takes 15 minutes, baking takes 55 minutes, and cooling takes 30 minutes. What time are the cookies ready?
Xavier begins his chess tournament match at 2:20 p.m. The match lasts 2 hours and 25 minutes. What time does it end?
Yara starts her laundry at 11:15 a.m. Washing takes 35 minutes, drying takes 50 minutes, and folding takes 20 minutes. What time is she finished?
Zoe begins her art project at 3:30 p.m. Sketching takes 25 minutes, painting takes 1 hour and 15 minutes, and cleanup takes 10 minutes. What time does she finish?
Adam starts his morning jog at 6:45 a.m. He jogs for 25 minutes, stretches for 10 minutes, and walks home for 8 minutes. What time does he arrive home?
Bella begins her Spanish lesson at 7:40 p.m. The lesson lasts 1 hour and 10 minutes, followed by 15 minutes of homework review. What time does she finish?
Chris starts his computer programming session at 10:50 a.m. He codes for 1 hour and 35 minutes, then debugs for 25 minutes. What time does he finish?
Diana starts her house cleaning at 9:15 a.m. Kitchen takes 30 minutes, living room takes 25 minutes, and bathrooms take 35 minutes. What time does she finish?

Fiona starts her tennis match at 6:10 p.m. The first set takes 35 minutes, the second set takes 42 minutes, and cool-down takes 8 minutes. What time does she finish?

Luna starts her meditation retreat at 7:00 a.m. Morning meditation is 45 minutes, walking meditation is 30 minutes, and closing meditation is 20 minutes. What time does she finish?

Maya starts her candle making class at 2:05 p.m. Wax preparation takes 30 minutes, pouring takes 15 minutes, and decoration takes 35 minutes. What time is she done?
Noah begins his model building session at 7:15 p.m. Parts preparation takes 20 minutes, assembly takes 1 hour and 10 minutes, and detailing takes 25 minutes. What time does he finish?
Olivia starts her embroidery project at 1:50 p.m. Pattern transfer takes 15 minutes, stitching takes 1 hour and 20 minutes, and finishing takes 10 minutes. What time is she done?

Ryan begins his disc golf round at 4:20 p.m. The front nine takes 45 minutes, break takes 10 minutes, and back nine takes 50 minutes. What time does he finish?

Uma starts her henna design session at 3:40 p.m. Design preparation takes 15 minutes, application takes 40 minutes, and drying time is 35 minutes. What time is the design ready?
Victor begins his geocaching adventure at 1:25 p.m. Finding the first cache takes 35 minutes, second cache takes 28 minutes, and third cache takes 42 minutes. What time does he find the third cache?
Wendy starts her macrame workshop at 6:45 p.m. Learning basic knots takes 20 minutes, practicing takes 30 minutes, and creating a project takes 50 minutes. What time does she finish?
